data.text: @AlyssaJade1220 @justinbieber luv you Alyssa ! Can't believe how grown and beautiful you have gotten since 1st grade Sunday school .
@justinbieber I have been balding cancer for 9/1/2 year I want to meet u so bad my dream is 2 be ur one less lonely girl so bad
